title: Podcast: Fear, Halloween and Houdini
text:
Podcast: Fear, Halloween and Houdini Andy Fitzpatrick , Battle Creek Enquirer 10:56 p.m. EDT October 23, 2015 Candle-lit Halloween pumpkins 9 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Join host Andy Fitzpatrick and guest co-host Jennifer Bowman as they talk about what they fear. 
Then, Teri Trudeau and Jessica Baier of the Marshall Recreation Department's Haunted Trail talk about scaring people since the 1990s. 
Finally, magician Ron Carnell will preview his upcoming Halloween seance to contact the spirit of Harry Houdini. Can he do it? Plus, Carnell provides some audio from the escape artist himself, and a recording of a seance that took place 10 years after Houdini's death. 
For more on the Haunted Trail, go to recpro.cityofmarshall.com or look for the event on Facebook. 
More information about comedy magician Ron Carnell and his shows at Colon's River Lake Inn, including the Houdini seance, can be found www.riverlakemagic.com. 
Contact Andy Fitzpatrick at 269-966-0697 or afitzpatrick@battlecreekenquirer.com. Follow him on Twitter: @am_fitzpatrick. Read or Share this story: http://bcene.ws/1S1LO3m TOP VIDEOS
